resources:
Commentary Screenreader
Commentary Screenreader is a program which will help blind people use their mobile phones. We made some attempts for innovation. For more details open settings\\help.\n Some functionality is restricted until you purchase the full version. For details, please contact the customer service in the official QQ group.\n \n Features: \n Voice Assistant: use your phone without touching it with our voice assistant.\n Extensions: install extensions to enhance your experience.\n Browse by character, word, paragraph… There is always a right browsing mode for your needs.\n The program is quick and responsive.\n Install sound themes that will always please your ears.\n Advanced copying functions allowing to copy exactly what you need.\n Contextual gestures allowing for the extreme flexibility.\n Remappable gestures.\n Flexible notification settings. You\'ll never be disrupted by something that doesn\'t interest you at the moment.\n \n Premium functionality:\n Virtual screen for inaccessible apps to open a new world for you.\n Automatic OCR identification: identify pictures and read text from them with ease.\n Lightning fast CAPTCHA recognition powered by artificial intelligence.\n Identify everything that\'s infront of you. People, scenes and objects.\n Web page filtering: read the web pages with ease, without images and disrupting content.\n Copy the whole screens with ease.\n Article reading mode: automatic page turning, content filtering… \n Customisable per-app gestures. Favorite list: have access to your favorite content, anywhere, anytime.\n Quick editing: quickly find the sentence, word or paragraph you want to edit.\n Advanced text selection: by word, sentence, paragraph. Select exactly the text you need.\n Various operations made easy by additional voice commands.\n Automatically running plugins, always have your favourite plugins accessible right away.\n The Commentary is your endlessly configurable and flexible screenreader!
Hebei Biyou Technology Co., Ltd. Commentary Screenreader uses some third-party technologies: Tencent AI, Baidu AI, Baidu TTS, Baidu Translator, Baidu MTS, Andro LUA Plus, ETC.
Menu
TTS speed: TTS speech rate.
Read usage hints: Read interaction hints based on the app you are interacting with.
Vibration feedback: use vibration feedback with the screenreader.
Use the proximity sensor: Stop reading when the proximity sensor is being touched.
Read notifications while the screen is locked: Read notifications while the screen is locked.
Audible feedback: Use the currently selected sound theme.
Read the list range: Read the information about the display range of the list when scrolling.
Use the node browsing mode (advanced users only) use the node browsing mode.
TTS volume: TTS volume is equal to media volume.
Use volume keys as the shortcut keys: Long press the volume buttons to execute various operations. TTS voice: Build in TTS voice.

Selecting Click and lift up finger to activate long click action: Simulate long press with click and lift up gesture Manage backups Use the custom dictionary (restart required to apply): Use online TTS: If Wi-Fi is not available, you will be automatically switched to the default TTS engine Gesture theme: Advanced text editing Manage gestures Automatic use of OCR recognition: Automatically identify focused image or unlabelled control. Selecting the same engine as the main engine will result in using only one engine. TTS engine used for reading content. If the selected engine is not working, the first available engine will be used.
